page.title: 07Life in a Beverley pub
page.content: Our pub is called the'{Mariners arms'. Living in a pub is very awkward because I have to lock all the doors after me. We have to pay for every drink that we have. I cannot ever go in the pub or the bottle store when it is opening time. I help my Dad bottle up, that means I have to put bottles on the shelves. Upstairs there is a lot of space, the pub is over 100 years old. Our living room used to be a dance hall,so it is very big. It has a bar at one end and a stage at the other. We need to have trained guard dogs in case of burglary. I am nine years old,when I grow up I would like a pub of my own.
